name: Square Root (BattleLicorne, Koryuto)
description:
Square Root

You play as a character who was captured by a monster while camping with friends. Fortunately, the cage where he was imprisoned was poorly locked. He was able to escape...The player must find objects that allow them to kill the monster and leave this world.

the player must pick up an object to destroy the monster, but the monster will not let it go!

Game made for the global jam 2023 !! 

Recommended PC
Processor: Ryzen 7 7700x 

Ram: 32GB DRR5 

Graphics: AMD 6800
